text.div:
Generated Narrative: StructureDefinition EHDSServiceRequest

NameFlagsCard.TypeDescription & Constraints
EHDSServiceRequest 0..*BaseService request model
Instances of this logical model can be the target of a Reference
serviceText 0..1stringC.8.1 - Service text
serviceCode 0..1CodeableConceptC.8.2 - Service code
Binding Description (No ValueSet): (preferred): LOINC, NPU, SNOMED CT

reasonCode 0..*CodeableConceptC.8.3 - Reason code
Binding Description (No ValueSet): (preferred): ICD-10 (ICD-11 when available), SNOMED CT, Orphacode


quantity 0..1QuantityC.8.4 - Quantity
anatomicLocation 0..*CodeableConceptC.8.5 - Anatomic location
Binding Description (No ValueSet): (preferred): SNOMED CT


reasonReference 0..*Reference(Observation model | Condition model | Medicinal product model | DocumentReference | DiagnosticReport)C.8.6 - Reason reference
priority 0..1CodeableConceptC.8.7 - Priority
Binding Description (No ValueSet): (preferred): HL7 Request priority

supportingInformation 0..*Reference(Observation model | Condition model | Procedure model | Medication administration model | Resource)C.8.8 - Supporting information
specimen 0..*Reference(Specimen model)C.8.9 - Specimen
subject 1..1Reference(Patient model | Group model | Location model | Device model)C.8.10 - Subject
encounter 0..1EHDSEncounterC.8.11 - Encounter
occurance[x] 0..1C.8.12 - Occurance
occuranceDateTimedateTime
occurancePeriodPeriod
patientInstructions 0..1stringC.8.13 - Patient instructions
coverage 0..*Reference(Coverage model)C.8.14 - Coverage

Documentation for this format

name: EHDSServiceRequest
title: Service request model
description: C.8 - EHDS refined base model for Specification of requested service or services

element.definition: C.8 - EHDS refined base model for Specification of requested service or services
Textual description of the requested service
A code that identifies a particular service (i.e., procedure, diagnostic investigation, or panel of investigations) that have been requested.

Health conditions affecting the health of the patient and are important to be known for a health professional during a health encounter. Clinical conditions of the subject relevant for the results interpretation.

binding.description: ICD-10 (ICD-11 when available), SNOMED CT, Orphacode

element.definition: Amount of requested services of the same type
Anatomic location and laterality where the procedure should be performed. This is the target site.
Indicates another resource that provides a justification for why this service is being requested.
Indicates how quickly the ServiceRequest should be addressed with respect to other requests.
Health conditions relevant for the results interpretation, e.g. fasting status, sex for clinical use, etc.
Specimens to be used by the laboratory procedure
Individual or Entity the service is ordered for
An encounter that provides additional information about the healthcare context in which this request is made.
When service should occur
Patient or consumer-oriented instructions
Insurance or medical plan or a payment agreement.
